competition_summary.context: Competition The principal methods of competition within the energy services industry are technological innovation, quality of service and price differentiation.  These factors vary geographically and are dependent upon the different services and products that Schlumberger offers.  Schlumberger has numerous competitors, both large and small. Intellectual Property Schlumberger owns and controls a variety of intellectual property, including but not limited to patents, proprietary information, trade
